title: The American Barbecue Showdown
text:
The <a href="Barbecue%20in%20the%20United%20States">American Barbecue</a> Showdown is a <a href="2020%20in%20American%20television">2020</a> <a href="reality%20television">reality television</a> <a href="Web%20series">web</a> <a href="Television%20show">series</a> filmed in <a href="Covington%2C%20Georgia">Covington</a>, <a href="Georgia%20%28U.S.%20state%29">Georgia</a> that premiered on <a href="Netflix">Netflix</a> on September 18, 2020. On August 9, 2021, Netflix renewed the series for a second season.
Concept.
Contestants from across America competing in a Barbecue Cook-off to be crowned American Barbecue Champion. Starting with 8 contestants,that evidently only brought one outfit that they wore the entire show,each of which have varying levels of experience at cooking on a barbecue. They have to face challenges cooking in different styles sometimes with extra surprise challenges thrown in without notice. There is a focus not just on the cooking aspect but maintaining the barbecue's temperature and smoking abilities. Each cooking task has to be completed within a set time frame often lower than the normal amount of time used to prepare and cook the specified meal.
Release.
"The American Barbecue Showdown" was released on September 18, 2020, on <a href="Netflix">Netflix</a>.
